SEARCH
Package getumbrellad.models.exceptions

Class Upgrade

java.lang.Object
getumbrellad.models.exceptions.Upgrade
public class Upgrade extends Object
Represents a shop upgrade in the game that can be purchased from NPCs. Each upgrade affects a specific player stat (e.g., maxHP, defense) and can be read from or written to a CSV file.

  • Field Details

    • upgrades

      public static ArrayList<Upgrade> upgrades
      All upgrades read from or written to CSV.

  • Constructor Details

    • Upgrade

      public Upgrade(String shopOwner, String name, int value, String increasedStat, String description, boolean isOwned, int cost)
      Constructs an Upgrade. Automatically adds this upgrade to the static upgrades list.
      Parameters:
      shopOwner - the name of the NPC shop owner offering this upgrade
      name - the name of the upgrade
      value - the value or magnitude of the upgrade
      increasedStat - the player stat affected by the upgrade
      description - a brief description of the upgrade
      isOwned - whether the upgrade has already been purchased
      cost - the coin cost of the upgrade

  • Method Details

    • getShopOwner

      public String getShopOwner()
      Returns the name of the shop owner offering this upgrade.
      Returns:
      the shop owner's name

    • getName

      public String getName()
      Returns the name of the upgrade.
      Returns:
      the upgrade's name

    • getValue

      public int getValue()
      Returns the value or magnitude of the upgrade.
      Returns:
      upgrade value

    • getIncreasedStat

      public String getIncreasedStat()
      Returns the stat that this upgrade affects.
      Returns:
      affected player stat

    • getDescription

      public String getDescription()
      Returns a short description of the upgrade.
      Returns:
      upgrade description

    • getIsOwned

      public boolean getIsOwned()
      Returns whether this upgrade has been purchased by the player.
      Returns:
      true if owned, false otherwise

    • getCost

      public int getCost()
      Returns the cost of this upgrade in coins.
      Returns:
      the upgrade's cost

    • setIsOwned

      public void setIsOwned(boolean newValue)
      Sets whether the upgrade is owned and updates the CSV data accordingly.
      Parameters:
      newValue - true if the upgrade is now owned, false otherwise

    • readUpgradesCSV

      public static void readUpgradesCSV()
      Reads upgrade data from stores.csv located in the resource directory, and repopulates the upgrades list.

    • writeUpgradesCSV

      public static void writeUpgradesCSV() throws PlayerNotFoundException, URISyntaxException
      Writes the current list of upgrades in upgrades to stores.csv.
      Throws:
      PlayerNotFoundException - if the store directory cannot be found
      URISyntaxException - if the resource URI for the store path is invalid

    • updateUpgrades

      public static void updateUpgrades()
      Updates the CSV by rewriting and reloading all upgrades from the file. If an exception occurs, a debug message is printed.
